item.description:
Let's continue the festivities a little while longer with a post-holiday party.  We're going to have an international pot luck and I thought it would be fun if everyone brought a traditional holiday dish from their own country.  It can be a main dish, appetizer, desert, drink, etc.  When you RSVP please post what you will be bringing along with your festive self!

 

This will be a joint event with the Eastern Mass Italian Language and Culture Meetup Group and the Acton-Boxborough International Dinner Party Meetup Group.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out the address closer to the date

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Post-Holiday Party and Pot luck
